description: Deletes a data source from a knowledge base.

parameters.name: dataSourceId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the data source to delete.

parameters.name: knowledgeBaseId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the knowledge base from which to delete the data source.

nested_items.name: dataSourceId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the data source that was deleted.

nested_items.name: knowledgeBaseId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the knowledge base to which the data source that was deleted belonged.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the data source.
